entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60. High 26. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
